extendedInfo.description: This is the pro version with lots of extras! There are no ads. An undo feature lets you undo anything up until you get more dice. A special icon is shown next to your scores to show you are a pro. Your high scores can also get on an exclusive all-time category in the high score boards! There's also a special multi-player challenge system to really see how well you did! A shared pro score that makes the high score board can be challenged by yourself or others. Challengers get the same dice and attempt to beat the original score. You can check back and see how well other people did with the same dice you got. Thank you very much for your support!Lock 'n' Roll is an intriguing puzzle game requiring a combination of luck and skill. Roll four dice at a time and arrange them on a 4x4 grid. Receive points for various combinations according to number and color.You must place all four dice and once you lock them down, they are fixed in place! the most difficult combinations are cleared from the board.Earn enough points and be rewarded with a Joker! The game keeps going until there are no more places for dice. How high can you score? That's entirely up to you...Prove your smarts in this fun dice game. Make the right patterns to score and keep the board clear. Show everyone on the score boards! Challenge scores shared by pro players and see how you do with the same dice! The #1 iPhone dice game is now here.Real comments:*Addicting and challenging* *Great & innovative puzzle game*

reviews.title: Michael Abbott
reviews.comment: You took away so much functionality by not being able to stack up and collect jokers; can\'t move jokers to the new dice left area; can\'t use jokers to move fixed dice around.  Your \"updates\" have seriously made this once fun treasure of a game a worthless and pointless farce.  If it ain\'t broke don\'t fix it!
reviews.author: Mike Abbott

reviews.title: Please fix
reviews.comment: New update disabled the function of filling the dice board with movable dice after clearing the board. Game is fun but much more better before update. Graphics aren\'t \'too\' bad. Just my screen is large (; *Samsung Note2* Pls fix. Thx. \\m/
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible update
reviews.comment: Graphics look cheap now and can\'t even find the new game button when in another game. I don\'t understand the benefit of this update. Didn\'t even update the screenshots to show new ui so can\'t be that proud of it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Graphics r horrible!!
reviews.comment: I use to have this game rated at 5 stars but i just updates it n omg does it look so cheap n horrible! Its so bad i dnt even wana play it anymore
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app, terrible update
reviews.comment: I love this game but I installed the latest update today and the new graphics are terrible! Please fix it!!
reviews.author: Angie LeMoine

reviews.title: Love this Game!
reviews.comment: This is the most addicting game I have on my Thunderbolt! I love that if I hit the home button on my phone the game doesn\'t reset so I can continue to work on my high score. I\'ve been playing the same game for about 6 weeks, so much better than having to start a game every time I open it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dope
reviews.comment: This is my favourite game.  Fantastic.  Started playing this with I phoned 3g an die never stopped... After 6 phones ;-)
